snippet: Bankers close to a plan to reduce Greece’s debt load by having the country purchase its discounted bonds are concerned that hedge funds might “blow up the deal” by holding out for a higher price.

headline.main: Concerns Mount That Investors Might Balk at Debt Buyback in Greece
headline.print_headline: Some Funds May Hold Out for Higher Prices on Greek Bonds
